linkModule.name: Good News articles from LGBTQ Nation
linkModule.description: Articles from LGBTQ Nation tagged with "Good News". Look through if you need a little hope!

linkModule.name: Trillions of dollars in Federal Aid were unfrozen.
linkModule.description: A CNN article talking about how the White House rescinded a Federal Aid Freeze after it caused a lot of confusion.

linkModule.name: Massachusetts officials protecting Trans Students.
linkModule.description: Despite a Federal Judge rescinding Title IX protections for trans students, Massachussets officials will continue to employ those protections.

linkModule.name: Sarah Mcbride becomes Deputy Whip
linkModule.description: An LGBTQ Nation article discussing how the first transgender person in congress, Sarah Mcbride, just became Deputy Whip.

linkModule.name: Virginia Senate rejects three anti-trans bills.
linkModule.description: A Washington Blade article about how the VA Senate Health and Education Committee shot down three anti-trans bills, including one about banning trans athletes in schools.

linkModule.name: Worcestor Citizens show support for Nonbinary Councilor
linkModule.description: In the face of blatant Transphobia, over a hundred people rallied behind Councilor Thu Nguyen, showing support for them.

linkModule.name: Michigan's Hate Crime law now include LGBTQ people.
linkModule.description: An LGBTQ Nation article covering Michigan's updated Hate Crime law, which includes LGBTQ people and other marginalized groups.
